William Gallas reveals former Arsenal teammate had panic attacks before facing Chelsea hero Didier Drogba

Former Arsenal captain William Gallas has revealed his ex-teammate Philippe Senderos suffered panic attacks before matches.

‘I knew Philippe Senderos, before a match he would need to speak a lot, you could see that he was sweating, that he did not feel good,’ Gallas told RMC. ‘Especially against certain players. I saw him against Chelsea, against Didier Drogba, where he would genuinely panic, like he was going through his match before playing it.

And unfortunately, when you saw him on the pitch, he lost his playing abilities, he didn’t play well. But against his own team-mates, he played better.’

https://metro.co.uk/2018/09/14/william-gallas-reveals-former-arsenal-teammate-had-panic-attacks-before-facing-chelsea-hero-didier-drogba-7943258/

Arsenal legend makes big Mesut Ozil claim as Unai Emery looks set to start him at Newcastle

Arsenal legend David Seaman has stated that Mesut Ozil should remain in the Arsenal team even when he doesn't play well.

Expected to be named in the starting XI at Newcastle United on Saturday after his impressive performance against Cardiff, Seaman feels that Ozil should always be in the team due to his attacking qualities.

"If you don't play well then you will get singled out. That's the way it is," Seaman told Standard Sport .

"He doesn't play well every game. I think a lot of fans expect him to play well every game when it's impossible.

"He's a quality player, there's no doubt about that. Sometimes people think he doesn't care, but that's just his style. He does care - a lot.

"And he's still got great qualities so, for me, he stays in the Arsenal team no problem."

https://www.football.london/arsenal-fc/news/mesut-ozil-emery-latest-arsenal-15150147

replies.msg:
'I had 166 passes and people only picked up on two' - Arsenal's Petr Cech defends his ball-playing skills


Cech said: “I had 166 passes in the first four games which is a huge amount and everybody picked up on only two.

“It’s obviously not a great thing to do when you pass the ball in a dangerous area, like I did at Cardiff when I gave it to Harry Arter but it’s part of the game that you can always make a mistake.”

Cech added: “If you look at the evolution of Barcelona and Man City, it didn’t happen overnight. As they got more familiar with that [style], the results came.

“We’re now in that process of getting to know what advantage it gives us.”

https://www.standard.co.uk/sport/football/i-had-166-passes-and-people-only-picked-up-on-two-arsenals-petr-cech-defends-his-ballplaying-skills-a3936081.html

replies.msg:
澳洲昆士蘭（Queensland）一間清潔公司推出「裸體」服務，客戶可以選擇要男性還是女性清潔工，同時還能選擇清潔工要穿著近乎裸體的衣物或是直接裸體來打掃，引發當地議員抨擊，不過該公司表示他們的業務需求蒸蒸日上，該公司一名女員工更透露，自己透過該工作每年賺進10.4萬美元，而且每周只要工作16小時。

▲清潔公司推出裸體清潔服務。（圖／翻攝自Bare All Cleaning Service）

據《每日郵報》報導，清潔公司「Bare All Cleaning Service」約成立5個月，該公司在官網上表示，他們提供家居清潔、清洗窗戶等各種不同服務，同時客戶可以選擇要男生或女生，還可以決定清潔工要穿著比基尼、濕T恤、裸上身或是全裸，不同的服裝、服務報價都不同。該公司指出，他們的服務讓無聊的苦差事變得有趣、性感。

▲清潔公司推出裸體清潔服務。（圖／翻攝自Bare All Cleaning Service）

一名在該公司擔任清潔工的28歲的單親辣媽透露，自己是商學畢業生，曾做過普通的清潔工作，但在該公司工作能賺到雙倍的薪水，工作時間也減少一半，現在她每週只要工作16小時，但是年收入卻達到10.4萬美元，她說：「我有一個很棒的身體，所以為什麼不炫耀它呢？我喜歡裸體而且享受肌膚在清掃時的感覺，所以我非常喜歡這份工作！」

▲清潔公司推出裸體清潔服務。（圖／翻攝自Bare All Cleaning Service）

不過該公司的服務也引起當地市議員抨擊，市議員克里克洛（Dawn Crichlow）7月時就表示，昆士蘭州連裸體海灘都沒有合法了，該公司怎麼會合法呢？克里克洛更質疑，這些員工用當裸體清潔工來過生活，但當地並不需要這種可恥的服務，要他們「去找一份真正的工作！」

對此該公司創辦人瓊斯（Brett Jones）則表示，該公司提供的不是性服務，而是清潔服務，不同之處在於人們得到的報酬比平常要多很多，稱他們的服務讓清潔工作不再乏味，更強調克里克洛的評論是「重傷」公司員工，堅稱該公司的服務完全合法。

【英超預告】阿仙奴靠埋門質「素」

【now.com體育】阿仙奴在周六英超作客紐卡素，兩軍在前線都有不錯發揮，似乎入球不會少。
撰文：歪花

在開季2連敗後，阿仙奴先後擊敗韋斯咸、卡迪夫城，而且新帥艾美利上仗終於肯起用每每後備上陣都有貨交的射手拿卡錫迪擔正，跟奧巴美揚合作攻堅，令進攻板斧大增。

不過，兵工廠的防守卻仍然令人失望，平均每場失2球，除了防中攔截力不足之外，一對中堅梅斯達菲、柏柏斯達夫普路斯的表現亦在水準以下。

紐卡素仍然未打開勝利之門，不過上仗面對曼城踢得未算太差，一對中場奇誠庸、迪亞美今戰面對兵工廠有望憑硬朗作風佔得甜頭。對藍月失利後，領隊賓尼迪斯未必會再次排出5後衛陣式，寧可加強中場。

新兵射手荷西朗頓早前於聯賽盃已開齋，此子在門前衝擊力極強，是兵工廠最怕的類型，他加上快翼艾約斯佩雷斯、羅拔堅尼地，有望破關搶分。

Unai Emery insists Arsenal players must speak English in dressing room - even though he's struggling with language

By John CrossChief Football Writer

https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/unai-emery-explains-arsenal-field-13246204

Ex-Arsenal defender blames the players and the English press for Arsene Wenger's unhappy ending

Former Arsenal and Manchester City full-back Bacary Sagna has spoken out about his reaction to Arsene Wenger leaving the Gunners after 22 years in charge.

"I was expecting it," said Sagna on Wenger's departure in the interview, translated by Sports Witness .

"Looking at how the fans had turned on him, what came next was logical. I don't think he could have continued in that context.

"It's quite a shame. Leaving like that after all he brought to the club. He changed the image of English football.

"Not everything can always go perfectly. He had good moments with Arenal. Always tried to keep a certain ethic in order to play and help develop youngsters, especially English. He's criticised when he's trying to help football.

"English people complain about always having more foreign players, to not have enough space for local talent, but when a manager, who's also French, does it, gives English players a chance, he's criticised by the press."

Arsenal Star Knows All About Rafa – Expects Difficult Game



Petr Cech was at Chelsea from 2004 through 2016 and played a massive 494 games for the Blues.

This is what the 36-year-old 24 times capped Czech Republic International has said to Sky Sports about today’s game:

“Last season, obviously the difference between being in the Champions League and Europa League was down to our away form.”

“We are aware of that and it was good to see that at Cardiff, in our second away game, we won it.”

“We want to carry on the momentum.”

“We are in a position where we dropped points in the first two games, now we need to keep winning to be able to close the gap at the top, if the top teams slip.”

“This time we go to Newcastle, we expect a difficult game – I know Rafa Benitez.”

“He is a very experienced coach with big tactical ability.”

“He will set up his team which is always difficult to play against, so we expect a tough game.”

replies.msg:
肥賓：艾美利似紅軍的我！

【now.com體育】紐卡素在周六英超主場迎戰阿仙奴，領隊賓尼迪斯賽前向兵工廠新帥艾美利大派高帽。

艾美利今季入主阿仙奴，在頭兩場先後敗予曼城、車路士，但近兩場回勇，擊敗韋斯咸、卡迪夫城，不過防線問題令人擔心，在這4場比賽未曾保住清白之身，合共失球達8球。

作為在英超的前輩，同樣是西班牙人的賓尼迪斯（Rafael Benitez）就力撐對方：「艾美利是一名好領隊，嘗試在另一個國家做出成績，但有時不太容易作出改變。阿仙奴是一支好球隊，主要在地面進攻，我認為他會保留傳統，改善一些細節。」

兩人也曾執教華倫西亞，因此足球哲學也有點相似，都是以分析為先。肥賓說：「他喜歡球隊有極強的組織性，現時他的踢法跟我在華倫西亞及利物浦時很相似。」

紐卡素VS阿仙奴
622-Now英超2台15/09 21:50直播

踢英超5年 原來奧燒未去過聖占士！

【now.com體育】在2013年夏天加盟阿仙奴，奧斯爾竟然從未作客跟紐卡素比賽，周六英超大有機會作出零的突破。

奧斯爾（Mesut Ozil）在2013年從皇家馬德里加盟阿仙奴後，轉眼已經5年多，球衣號碼亦變成10號，但原來他因為受傷、輪換、紐卡素降班的原因，從未出訪過這支東北球隊。

上季，阿仙奴在次循環作客紐卡素，奧燒就因為剛於歐霸盃遠征俄羅斯，在輪換下未有披甲，結果兵工廠以1:2敗陣。不過，這名前德國國腳在首循環主場出擊就對紐記一箭定江山。

由於奧斯爾在剛過去的國際賽期不用比賽，因此養精蓄銳，相信可在今場首次作客紐卡素，全力搏殺。艾美利表示：「他狀態不錯，我從他眼中看到專注。我能推動他進步，從而在場上交出最佳表現。」

紐卡素VS阿仙奴
622-Now英超2台15/09 21:50直播

replies.msg:
That ability to distribute the ball from deep—to find passes between opposition lines and effectively advance the team up the field—is what makes Xhaka so valuable to his coaches. Once he got into Wenger’s Arsenal team, he was rarely out of it. That’s presumably because his arrival vaguely coincided with the loss of Santi Cazorla to chronic achilles problems. The Spaniard was the man charged with instigating Arsenal’s attacks from deep, be that with a slaloming dribble or an incisive pass. Xhaka can’t dribble, but then it was never particularly realistic for the Gunners to expect to find another Cazorla. And, in fairness to him, he really can pass.

That naive cross-field ball against Cardiff is offset by 99 other passes played on the day. In fact, according to Opta, Xhaka has made more passes into the final third than any other outfield player in the Premier League since the start of last season. At Arsenal, there’s no-one who can come close to his total of 535. Mesut Ozil is the second-highest, and he has just 236 to his name.

The stats this season again underline his value. Xhaka is averaging more passes into the final third per 90 mins (14.6) than either of his midfield rivals, Uruguayan Lucas Torreira (6.8) and Frenchman Matteo Guendouzi (6.5).
